page.title: 20Michael The Milkman
page.content: My wife an I own a grocers shop and I operate a milk run four days a week. Monday a single delivery, Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday double deliveries. I have an assistant, a "Saturday Girl", Tracy, who helps with the milk run. The milk arrives from Kelso at 5am, and my day begins when I get up at 5.30am. After breakfast I start the milk run, which is in two parts, Yetholm, and the country. The town part takes about 1\ hours, so after that I have a break. The country part includes farms, Morebattle, and as far as Hownam and takes another 1\ hours. When the whole run is finished, a distance of 35 miles, and all the empty crates are tidied, the shop part of the day starts. The shop is open 8 'till 6 except Sunday. When in the shop,we stock up, clean, reorder, do the accounts and sell.
